Eugenics-27.op_claim: I think that Eugenics would be beneficial to society and create a far more peaceful world. CMV
Eugenics-27.op_premise: ["I think that a world in which only the most superior humans live would be a much better one in helping our race to survive. It is fundamentally evolution. The world would be more peaceful and a much better place to live than it is today. Movies like Gattaca show a possibility of having superior being living alongside inferior but I think that natural birth should become illegal and babies can only be created using eugenics. I know this would be hard to do but families should really think before having natural birth when Eugenics is available considering their child would have a much lesser life. Eventually I think that the world would only exist of superior beings capable of solving many crisis' and protecting our race."]

reply_contents.content: Eugenics creates a feedback loop that amplifies and distorts any flaws in our understanding of phylogeny, gene functions, and epigenetic effects
